entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
